didHealthOnboardingDescription: Select the kind of entity you are:
didHealthOnboardingBulletDescription: Patient: (a Person Who consumes Healthcare services) - Practitioner: (Doctors, Nurses, and other healthcare professionals) - Organization: (Hospital, Medical Practice, Insurance Company, etc.) - Device: (Monitor, Machine, etc.)
onboardingInstructions: Follow the steps below to create your decentralized health identity.
authorizewithEpicviaSMARTonFHIRtoviewand: Authorize with Epic via SMART on FHIR to view and download your records.
searchEpicFHIRBrands: Search for Your Epic HealthCare Provider to connect
noSupportedBitcoinWalletsFound: No supported Bitcoin wallets found. Install UniSat or Xverse.

RegisterDIDBTC.title: Register did:health to Bitcoin
RegisterDIDBTC.inscribe: Inscribe this IPFS URI on Bitcoin via:
RegisterDIDBTC.confirmInWallet: Please confirm in your UniSat wallet...
RegisterDIDBTC.feeSupport: This fee supports decentralized health identity infrastructure. After payment, you can continue with registration.

setupStorage.title: Set up your health data storage on Web3.Storage

status.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
status.emailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox and confirm to continue.
status.error: Error setting up Web3.Storage space. Please try again.

encryptionSkipped: Encryption was skipped for this resource type.
EncryptionNotRequired: Your record will be visabile to everyone!
noDIDFound: No did:health found on supported chains
failedToDecryptFHIR: Failed to decrypt encrypted FHIR file. Check Lit connection and wallet access.
failedToFetchFHIRResource: Failed to fetch FHIR resource from IPFS
didNotFoundInInscriptionsFor: did:health not found in inscriptions for

onboarding.connectWalletDescription: To begin, please connect a crypto wallet to your identity.

selectBlockchain.title: Create Your did:health
selectBlockchain.subtitle: Step 1: Choose a Blockchain
selectBlockchain.checkDid: Already registered? Click here to view your did:health.

ethereum.name: Ethereum
ethereum.description: Use Ethereum or L2s like Base, Arbitrum, and Optimism

bitcoin.name: Bitcoin
bitcoin.description: Coming Soon: Register your did:health using Bitcoin and Ordinals

solana.name: Solana
solana.description: Create a did:health on the fast and scalable Solana blockchain
solana.inscriptionDescription: Your did:health will be registered with a Solana inscription that references your encrypted FHIR resource stored on Web3.Storage.
solana.didCreatedSuccess: Your did:health has been successfully registered with a Solana inscription. The inscription references your encrypted document stored on Web3.Storage.
solana.encryptionWithWeb3: Your document will be encrypted and stored on Web3.Storage. The inscription will reference this encrypted document.

cosmos.name: Cosmos
cosmos.description: Coming Soon: Use Cosmos chains like Osmosis, Juno, or Stargaze

yourDIDBTC: Your did:health is automatically generated from your Bitcoin wallet address:
reInscribeThisIPFSURIOnBitcoin: Re-inscribe this IPFS URI on Bitcoin using Ordinals (e.g. Unisat):

didHealth.title: What is a did:health?
didHealth.subtitle: A did:health is a self-owned digital ID that links to your health data. It powers secure, decentralized health applications—like direct messaging and provider discovery—by identifying patients, practitioners, organizations, and devices in a trusted ecosystem.
